Pledges.description: HELP MAKE IT POSSIBLE! You contribute to the launch of the world's smallest wireless scanner! A huge Thank You from the entire Dacuda Team! We will keep you updated on our progress!
For those of you who value luxury, we are offering a neoprene case to protect PocketScan. Just increase your pledge by $15 and we’ll recognize it!
DACUDA POLO SHIRT: Don’t just be a backer, but look the part by getting one of the Dacuda branded polo shirts shown in our PocketScan demo video on Kickstarter. (Please add $5 for Shipping)

EARLY BIRD: Get the Early-Bird PocketScan in White and be one of our first supporters! Thank you for believing in our project and get it for much cheaper than the anticipated retail price of $149. Includes the unique Dacuda scan software for Mac, Windows, and iPad. (Please add $10 for Shipping)

EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER PRODUCT: Get the exclusive Kickstarter PocketScan White for $50 less than the anticipated retail price of $149. Includes the unique Dacuda scan software for Mac, Windows, and iPad. Delivered to you by Christmas! (Please add $10 for Shipping)

LIMITED COLOR EDITION: Get PocketScan in one of two colors determined by voters' choice and be part of the design process by voting on the colors! Includes the unique Dacuda scan software for Mac, Windows, and iPad. (Please add $10 for Shipping)

DEVELOPER KIT: Get three PocketScans in White with our Software Developer Kit (SDK) to connect it seamlessly with your own apps or cloud service! Includes the unique Dacuda scan software as well as API documentation for Mac OS X, Windows, and iOS.

EXCLUSIVE FACTORY TOUR: We take your care for transparency to heart and want to give you a unique insight in the production process of PocketScan. Accompany one of our founders to the PocketScan factory in Asia and get your personal tour! Includes a family style dinner in a small group and hotel accommodation for one night. Airfare NOT included.
